changeSet.comment: Update section to 'Accounts Group' for all grouping nodes
changeSet.sql: UPDATE chart_of_accounts SET section = 'Accounts Group' WHERE description IN ( 'Non-Current Assets', 'Current Assets', 'Equity', 'Non-Current Liabilities', 'Current Liabilities', 'Income', 'Expenses', 'Profit or Loss', 'Off-Balance Sheet Accounts', 'Property, Plant and Equipment', 'Investment Property', 'Intangible Assets', 'Non-Current Financial Assets', 'Other Non-Current Assets', 'Inventories', 'Trade and Other Current Receivables', 'Prepayments to Suppliers', 'Cash and Cash Equivalents', 'Staff Settlements', 'Assets Classified as Held for Sale', 'PDCs Received', 'Issued Share Capital', 'Non-Current Loans Received', 'Non-Current Bank Loans Received', 'Current Financial Liabilities', 'Current Loans', 'Current Bank Loans', 'Current Finance Lease Liabilities', 'Trade and Other Current Payables', 'Revenue', 'Trade Discounts and Rebates', 'Output VAT', 'Cost of Sales', 'COS: Employee Benefits Expenses', 'Administrative Expenses', 'Finance and Other Expenses' );
